name: The Legend of Rufa
description:
The Legend Of Rufa is a 2D platformer with RPG elements, in which you can play with two separate characters and use their combined powers to overcome a variety of obstacles. There’s a lot of action involved as well, since all sorts of enemies try to stop your progress along the way. 

The whole story revolves around a nasty witch who wants to destroy the world, and she uses cold to do so. Hence, your heroes must keep warm along the way, since the cold is constantly draining their health. You can pick up various power-ups to increase your health, on the other hand.
